item.content:encoded:
To help people who are struggling financially, the South African government provides different grants or money assistance.

However, many people who receive these grants are confused about how to apply, who qualifies, and how they get paid.

In this article, I’ll share my personal experience specifically with how grant money is paid out. I’ll also explain how to change the payment method for the SASSA R370 grant if you need to. Let’s get started!

How to Change SASSA R370 Payment Method

To Change SASSA R370 Payment Method Here are the steps should take:

  • first, visit the official SASSA website: srd.sassa.gov.za
  • scroll down to the section that says “How do I change my banking Details?”
  • clicked on the link that says “Apply for changes and change the payment method for SASSA R350 grant from post office to online bank account”
  • A form will open up where you will enter your new bank account information and after that click on submit

When I first applied for the SASSA grant, I registered using my cell phone number. So when I changed my payment details, SASSA sent me a message about it on my phone.

Overall, my experience with SASSA has been good so far. I get my grant payment on time without any problems now. If you are still going to the post office and shops to get your SASSA R370 grant, I really encourage you to change your payment method to direct bank deposit instead.

How long does it take for SASSA to verify banking details

SASSA typically completes the verification of your bank account details within seven working days. During this time, SASSA diligently processes and verifies the provided bank details, ensuring all necessary formal procedures are accurately completed.

How to check SASSA R370 payment dates for 2024

To check your SASSA R370 payment date for 2024, visit https://350statuscheck.org.za/.

Why is my SASSA R370 is approved but no payment?

If your SASSA R370 is approved but no payment has been received, wait for SASSA to provide your payment. SASSA will issue your payment on the day indicated on your status SASSA R370 STATUS.

How Can I Collect My SASSA Money on Payment Date?

SASSA has announced when people will get their Sassa payment for May 2024. They’ll start payment people at 03 may 2024 for Old Age Grant.

Disability Grant Payment Date for May 2024

People who receive the Disability Grant will get their money on Monday, May 6th, 2024. If you get any other grants along with your disability grant, you’ll receive them at the same time.

Children Grant Payment Date for May 2024

Parents who receive money for their Child Grant will receive their Child Grant payment on Tuesday, May 7th, 2024.

You can receive your money from this pay points or stores partnered with SASSA, such as Shoprite, Boxer, or Pick n Pay. Just make sure to visit the pay point on your payment date.
